main.name: Espressoteric
main.description: We love making the best coffee for our community around Westwood and especially welcome UCLA students with a student discount for coffee
main.bio: We are a small local coffee shop that got inspired by a certain old kind of inside architecture. Westwood really needed a place for students to meet and hang out or even study together while having high quality coffee.
main.contactmessage: Get in touch with us! We are always open to new ideas and collaborations!
